html: (2 Nephi 23:3)."Mine anger is not upon them that rejoice in my highness." The Book of Mormon clarification of this verse is most helpful in eliminating the ambiguity of the wording in the Bible. The Lord's "anger" (displeasure or wrath) is not directed toward those who "rejoice in [His] highness" (eminence or majesty). These are they who find joy in worshiping and serving Him.
